title: I have heard the story of a bulldozer actually buried underneath College Road at New Center. When College Road was widened to the four lanes are more than it is now during the work of digging out the bad soil, supposedly a large dozer or stuck in the mud. It was so old and so expensive to remove it was buried there. Is this true?
